title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
EB: When selecting an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selected item should be highlighted and the focus should remain on the selected item.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view for the first time.
3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the item.
4. Repeat the same steps again and verify that the item is selected correctly.
